author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.4.2 - Response size safety limits (hub enforces 128KB cap):

- Source retrieval tools (get_app_source, get_driver_source) truncate at 64KB to stay under hub's 128KB response limit
- Global response size guard in handleMcpRequest catches ANY oversized response before sending
- Item-level backups capped at 64KB to protect hub state storage
- Debug logging truncated to 500 chars to prevent log spam from large responses
- Fixes hub lag/crash when retrieving large app source (e.g. MCP Rule Server's own 4000+ line source)
